sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import './about.css' export default function Bio() { return (

About Me

Hello, my name is Tyler Phillips and welcome to my portfolio! I am excited to tell you all about who I am and why I decided to learn web development. I recently decided to pivot into the tech industry for I wanted to seek out a challenge that would place me outside my comfort zone. I love to be creative and watch my project's come to life from start to finish. I spent about 6 years and am still currently writing and recording music. Some of my hobbies include: PC gaming, Song writing, Anything outdoors, antique shopping, and playing guitar just to name a few! I look forward to expanding on my knowledge throughout this course and ultimately carry what I learn here into the work field.

) }
